page.title: 16 New Road near Strelley
page.content: An owner-occupier on the{Bilborough {Estate}says: "Personally it will be very good for me because it's going to cut the traffic that travels in front of my house by half. And because of how they've built the road I don't think it has spoilt the park. But one thing bothers me about the new road: is it going to be difficult for us to cross it when we want to go up to Strelley village for a walk? The new road will be a main road to the M1 and obviously the traffic will be going at great speed." A{Strelley Villager}says: "I think the new road will be a good thing because it will cut off the village even more than it is now and may help to preserve it by creating a more-easiy defended boundary."
